short_description: fumc is a surgeons & physicians clinic based in antipolo, philippines.
long_description: book your laboratory home service appointment now. fumc hotline numbers (02) 87278845 (antipolo) and (02) 82916538 (valenzuela) / clinic hours: 8:00am to 5:00pm daily. fatima university medical center offers quality healthcare in the service of communities in the camanava and rizal. fumc continue to evolve with the times, - with its dedication to the science of medicine and the commitment to patient care deeply ingrained in the system; establishing its rightful place in the healthcare industry as one of the leading players and contributors to nation building. the pain management clinic of fumc offers a wide range of relief for various severe chronic pain. our internal medicine experts and consultants provide preventive care as well as treat acute or chronic illnesses.. our board-certified specialists provide preventative care and guidance for better lifestyle choices as well as offer treatment for common medical conditions.. fatima university medical center (fumc) has been at the forefront of medical hospital service in northern metro manila for the past 4 decades.

generated_description: fatima university medical center (fumc) is a healthcare provider located in antipolo, calabarzon, philippines. established over four decades ago, fumc has grown from a 20-bed general hospital to a 150-bed facility equipped with advanced medical technology. the hospital offers a wide range of tertiary healthcare services, including emergency medicine, anesthesiology, internal medicine, family medicine, obstetrics and gynecology, ophthalmology, pediatrics, and surgery. fumc serves the residents of valenzuela, malabon, caloocan, navotas, bulacan, and antipolo, providing comprehensive medical care and preventive health services. the center is recognized for its expertise in diagnostic and therapeutic procedures, including laser refractive surgeries and advanced cardiac care.
